QuestData.Title: The Burlap Trail: To Burlap Waystation
QuestData.Description: Bad fortune for grummles today. Hozen have begun to ravage! They attack our supply line to the Serpent's Spine.$b$bCan you help? We are not fighters. We are grummles. Good fortune to those who help grummles.$b$bGo with a group of grummles to the Burlap Waystation. Keep them safe. Make sure at least one grummle survives.$b$bGrummles shall reward. Grummles always reward.
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect a group of grummles travelling to the Burlap Waystation. At least one grummle must survive.$b$bIf you lose your grummles, you can search the Burlap Trail or return to One Keg and wait for the next group to leave.
QuestData.RewardText: Many thanks and fortune to you, friend of grummles. But the journey to the Serpent's Spine is not safe yet.

Objectives.Objective: Escort grummles to the Burlap Waystation
